de.lessvoid.niftyinternal.math

Class Mat3

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.niftyinternal.math.Mat3
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Mat3
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Holds a 3x3 matrix.
    Version:
    $Revision$ $Id$
    Author:
    cix_foo , void256 - removed all of the base class methods and some of the vector/transformation operations to make the class usable as a self contained class.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
